channel.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
channel.description:
Class-Necromancer
Neutral Killing
Passive-Soulless-You are immune to death once.
Passive-Unfair Acts-"Death Bet" won't count if you killed them yourself.
Day Ability-Death Bet-Bet on 3 players to die. You will gain one soul for each of the 3 players that die the next night. Unlimited use.
Night Ability-Soul Surge-Spend souls to kill the same amount of players. Example-You spend two souls to kill two players.
Goal-Kill everyone that doesn't need to to survive.
------------------
-----------------
Class-Stocker
BD Support
Night Ability-Stock Up-Refill all of a player's limited abilities. You can't target the same player multiple times. 3 Uses.
--------------
Class-Thief (Converted Stocker)
Unseen Offensive
Passive-Sneaky-Observers cant see your visits. You can't be seen by the Princess's wisp
Night Ability-Shadow Steal-Steal one of each limited ability the player has. You will gain 1 extra use for each limited ability you steal. 2 Uses.
Goal-Unseen Goal

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
Wait nvm.

It only refills up to your original amount. So it can’t go down.

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: cupcakeaj2
item.description:
Nightshade starts at 1 so I guess it refills it to 1 but If they already have nightshade then it gives it an extra one?

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.description:
well then restocker is overpowered.

what would it do to nightshade? give it infinite uses?

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

I would imagine that it would restock the priest’s “Bind soul” ability and not revive.

Actually… it would restock both:

cupcakeaj2:

Night Ability-Stock Up-Refill all of a player’s limited abilities. You can’t target the same player multiple times. 3 Uses.

… as well the one-shot Night Immunity if it was spent.

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
JammySplodge:

Priest revives 4 BD

GREAT IDEA

I would imagine that it would restock the priest’s “Bind soul” ability and not revive.

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
JammySplodge:

Priest revives 4 BD

GREAT IDEA

That wouldn’t be possible(as you can only target someone once) but even 2 revives or 6 executes or 2 Posse Comitatus seem to be a bit too powerful, especially those revives.

Read full topic

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
cupcakeaj2:

You gain an extra use of it for each successful steal.
Also I changed the Stocker

if you have 2 unsuccessful steals in a row (knight, physician, alchemist, etc.) he becomes worth less.

stocker is good now though

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.description:
You gain an extra use of it for each successful steal.

Also I changed the Stocker

item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
like the idea of thief, needs infinite uses of his ability though.

necromancer is cool. going off of reaper and soul catcher, when you are attacked, you will be night immune but will spend a soul.

also, soul surge should have a cap of 3 at a time and 2 uses.

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.title: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
cupcakeaj2:

Class-Necromancer
Neutral Killing
Passive-Soulless-You are immune to death once.
Passive-Unfair Acts-“Death Bet” won’t count if you killed them yourself.
Day Ability-Death Bet-Bet on 3 players to die. You will gain one soul for each of the 3 players that die the next night. Unlimited use.
Night Ability-Soul Surge-Spend souls to kill the same amount of players. Example-You spend two souls to kill two players.
Goal-Kill everyone that doesn’t need to to survive.

if I stock pile enough souls, I could kill the entirety of the blue dragon in one go!

cupcakeaj2:

Class-Stocker
BD Support
Night Ability-Stock Up-Refill all of a player’s limited abilities. 3 Uses.

Just a few options: prince can kill on the slightest suspicion, because you can give him back his exes; of you refill sheriff, he can make 4 more knights (plus to normal cap at two in the beginning, potential 6 knights in a game); priest can revive 4 times; etc.

cupcakeaj2:

Class-Thief (Converted Stocker)
Unseen Offensive
Passive-Sneaky-Observers cant see your visits. You can’t be seen by the Princess’s wisp
Night Ability-Shadow Steal-Steal one of each limited ability the player has. You will gain 1 extra use for each limited ability you steal. 2 Uses.
Goal-Unseen Goal

if you select two players in a row who don’t have limited uses (a knight and then a physician, or other classes) you become worthless.

Read full topic
item.source: New Class Ideas-Necromancer, Stocker, and Thief

item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I can’t read it will try though

Ami:

Watch out for Rope. Thats my idea.

Say my name in full, lad!

it is hard to see where one class ends and the other begins. plays a punch of ------- in a row with a space above them to create a line.

alternatively, just do this to separate them:

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Read full topic
